meals.title: Sesame Schnitzel Chicken Sandwiches
meals.description: A chicken schnitzel sandwich with homemade brioche buns, a red cabbage and dill slaw. Topped with harissa-honey, garlic tahini, and pickled onions to top

meals.title: Creamy White Beans and Herb Oil
meals.description: Whole white beans in a white bean sauce with lots of olive oil and a parsley and garlic herb oil to top. Homemmade focaccia on the side.

meals.title: BLOAT
meals.description: Bacon, Lettuce, Onion, Avocado, Tomato sandwich with a garlic mayonaisse to ease it down your gullet
